name: Best Frequency Prediction
description: Optimized for maximum frequency prediction range (49.39)
tuning_notes:
This configuration achieved the highest frequency prediction range (49.39) by:
- Increasing frequency_scale_init from 10.0 to 25.0
- Increasing frequency_bias_init from 2.0 to 3.0
- Reducing weight_decay from 1e-4 to 5e-5
- Balancing magnitude_weight and frequency_weight at 1.5
- Reducing scaling_wd_multiplier from 3 to 2
